> ???: MINIONS! I HAVE COME TO BRING YOU DEATH! I AM THE REAPER THAT
> WILL REMOVE YOUR STAIN ON THE UNIVERSE! FEAR ME, FOR I AM AZUREBLADE!
> 
> There. The challenge was issued. He readied his pulse cannon, his
> missile launcher and his sword. This would be a day they'd wish had
> never come!

From the distance three shadows seem to almost materialize in the
distance as cold laughter echoes back at Azureblade. "You do not belong
here Predacon." 

The shadows as they approach take on distinct forms: A trio of black
shapes looking like both beast and machine with large outswept wings as
if to catch an air that all knows doesn't exist here on the moon. Long
serpentine necks end in large and elongated reptillian heads with jaws
filled with rows of teeth. Optics blaze as boosters mounted on thier
backs flare. Long whiplike tails complete the picture, swishing behind
them as they agiliy push through the faint atmosphere of the moon.

"And the only thing you will reap here is your own DEATH!"

They continue to approach, as what could only be cannons glow and rip
into the area Azureblade stands!


Preston
(Da'minion)
